name: Blocker Swapper
description:
Blocker Swapper: An Indie Casual Game By @RXTwister

Inspired from the casual games of the 2000s. You will be feeling nostalgic after this. The game is simple, You swap blocks and make a 3 in a row match. It's easy but very boring. And that's why I put extra gamemodes. This game is also in development, so there will be a lot of bugs and changes.

My Youtube Channel: RXTwister - YouTube

 Beta 1.0 - The game's first release

 Beta 1.0.1 - Resolution updated, You can fail in classic if you ran out of moves.
